ModMetaData.name: Plants and Things
ModMetaData.author: OdysseyScorpio
ModMetaData.description:
Adds extra research which unlocks the ability to grow and farm 50 different plants.

Grow yourself cloth, food, guns and medical items if you have the right research. Items will require research plus one of 6 tiered research projects.

Updated to include stone blocks and an initial research project requirement - also reduced amount of research work each tier requires.
